overview: Trisha is stuck in a very unhappy marriage where she is continually disrespected. After she finally gathers the courage to leave her husband, she takes some time alone to explore herself. The truth of liberation inspires Trisha to create the Divorced Wives Club, an interactive website where women are encouraged to explore their realms of sexuality. When Trisha's site becomes an internet sensation, every woman who logs on will experience erotic pleasure they have never felt before.
title: Divorced Wives Club
